segments.text: Taylor , can you tell me how to apply for a job on the Internet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do I have to send an E-mail ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are expected to know the E-mail address of the unit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I still don't know which unit is in need of staff .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Send out an application through Job-wanted on the website .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can any unit see my information ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a two-way choice . And your application will be read .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sina , 21st Century Talent Net , and a few others .
segments.speaker: S2
